description.value:
Trigger A creature who is not carrying a wayfinder with an aeon stone from the nexus slotted into it approaches within 15 feet of the aeon nexus

Effect The trap shocks the target, dealing @Damage[2d8[electricity]] damage to the triggering creature (@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true]), then rolls initiative.

stealth.details: (DC 20 to find the cluster of aeon stones at the center of the nexus in the fog)

details.description: A small cluster of aeon stones floats two feet off the ground, orbiting by shards of shattered aeon stones that crackle with electricity.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:23|name:Remove Aeon Stone|traits:magical,trap] (trained) to remove one nexus aeon stone from the center
details.routine: (3 actions) The trap loses one action each turn for each nexus aeon stone removed from its center. On each action, it shoots a jet of electrified, razor-sharp aeon stone shards at a different creature within 30 feet, dealing @Damage[1d8[piercing]] damage and @Damage[1d8[electricity]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true|name:Aeon Nexus]).
